Every day, we are helping our forgotten communities and Americans achieve their full potential and live the American dream.
						President Donald J. Trump					BUILDING A BRIGHTER FUTURE: The booming economy is lifting millions of Americans out of poverty and providing all people with the opportunity for a brighter future.
